mapper.insert: insert into goods_order(goods_order_num, goods_order_date, emp_num, contract_num, sup_num, goods_order_qty) values(#{goodsOrderNum}, sysdate, #{empNum}, #{contractNum}, #{supNum}, #{goodsOrderQty})
mapper.select: select goods_order_num, goods_order_date, emp_num, go.sup_num, goods_order_qty, g.goods_num, goods_name from goods_order go join contract c on go.contract_num = c.contract_num join goods g on c.goods_num = g.goods_num

select goods_order_num, goods_order_date, emp_num, c.contract_num, go.sup_num, goods_order_qty, g.goods_num, goods_name from goods_order go join contract c on go.contract_num = c.contract_num join goods g on c.goods_num = g.goods_num where goods_order_num = #{goodsOrderNum}
